post_title: T206 Griffith Portrait SGC 3 VG and T206 Huggins Portrait SGC 4 VG-EX. Sold.
post_content:
T206 Griffith portrait SGC 3 VG-(Sold)
 
T206 Huggins Portrait SGC 4 VG-EX-there is a white S at a diagonal in the lower left side of the portrait on the uniform. This has to be from the original production of the card-$250.00 (Sold)


S/h outside of California, Oregon or the state of Washington is $5.00. If shipped to the aforementioned states, the s/h is $5.50. If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
